name: Apollo.Go()
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2021!
Apollo is a little robot with a partner. After an EMP strikes, his companion is deactivated and lost. Now, Apollo must find the pieces of his loved one using his limited skill set to fight and flee a dangerous planet!

How to Play WalkA & DResetRInteract / SelectEJumpSpaceCrouchSLook UpWAttackJ

Note: There are combinations of skills, but all of them use combinations of these commands.
